messages.subject: Website of kids games and movies etc.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi last week sometime someone posted a website of games that had tons of stuff for 2-6 year olds.  games and wee videos etc.  Kids something.  Could you please
messages.messageBody:
Hi last week sometime someone posted a website of games that had tons of stuff for 2-6 year olds. games and wee videos etc. Kids something. Could you please let us know where that was again? Cheers.
Madz
----- Original Message -----
From: Jgirlsemail@...
To: Arts-Crafts-Homeschool@yahoogroups.com
Cc: Learning_Adventures@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2005 7:07 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Correction: art game site!




Sorry! Try it like this:

_http://www.eduweb.com/pintura_ (http://www.eduweb.com/pintura)



http://www.eduweb.com/pintura/)

This is a fantastic art site for kids!


A. Pintura: Art Detective

(_http://www.eduweb.com/pintura/_ (http://www.eduweb.com/pintura/) )



Julie ~Hs mom for 16 years to Jessica-24, Jeremiah-15, Josiah-13, Jenna-11
